attributes.action: Let more females fight at the front
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that it is unfair that females don't get sent to the Front like men. When they sign the dotted line applying for the armed forces they expect to be turned into a soldier. Many people join the forces to serve their country, but how can they do it if men aren't having faith in them. Several times during history women have fought why not now?
